about_the_game:
Adventure and destiny await you in the expansive 40 square kilometer realm of "Afallon," an open-world role-playing game. Start out as an inexperienced explorer and ascend to become a hero admired all across the realm.

Choose Your Destiny

Choose from eight distinct classes: Shieldmaster, Necromancer, Wizard, Berserker, Druid, Assassin, Hunter, or Death Knight. Each class offers three talent trees for customization.

Dungeons

Explore dungeons hidden across the world of Afallon, filled with treasures and challenges. Turn dungeons into "Corrupted" versions for tougher encounters and better rewards.

Dynamic and Evolving World

The game world in Afallon dynamically adapts to your progress, ensuring a continuously evolving and engaging experience. As your character gains strength, through increasing levels, enhancing "Item Power," and completing quests, the world around you transforms to reflect your growing prowess.

New, more challenging enemies with unique abilities begin to appear, providing fresh combat experiences and keeping the battles intense. These foes not only test your skills but also drop rare and powerful loot that matches your advancing capabilities, offering constant rewards for your progress.

In addition to tougher enemies, the world will also generate different treasure chests, hidden in new locations, filled with valuable items and gear tailored to your character's growth. These chests ensure that exploration remains rewarding and that there's always something new to discover.

The game doesn't just scale in difficulty; it evolves around your journey. Quests and storylines unfold in response to your achievements, introducing new challenges and opportunities. The combination of these factors, level, Item Power, and quest completion ensures that Afallon is a living, breathing world that grows with you, offering an ever-changing landscape that keeps the experience fresh and exciting, making sure the world never feels static or boring.

Crafting

Crafting professions like Blacksmithing, Alchemy, Tailoring, Gemcutting, Enchanting, and Leatherworking allow you to gather resources such as ores, flowers, gems, and animal hides to create powerful gear and valuable items. You start with a limited number of recipes, but as you progress, you can discover, purchase, or earn new ones from quests and enemies. Crafting not only enhances your character but also provides opportunities for earning gold through trading or selling crafted goods. This system adds depth to gameplay, making you more self-sufficient and connected to the world around you.

Unique Companions

You can recruit unique companions through quests and random encounters as you explore the world. Each companion you acquire offers a distinct set of skills, ranging from healing and spellcasting to stealthy assassinations and powerful melee combat. These companions are more than just allies; they bring specialized abilities that can complement your playstyle and significantly impact your success in battles. Whether you need a healer to keep you alive, a spellcaster to unleash magical attacks, or a warrior to stand by your side in the thick of combat, each companion adds depth and strategy to your journey.

Embark On Your Epic Journey In Afallon

In "Afallon," legend is not born from mere dreams here, it is forged in the fire of your will. Can you rise to the challenge? Discover your power, shape your destiny, and leave your mark on a world that grows with you. Welcome to Afallon, where every choice is a legacy waiting to happen.

name: Afallon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 9600 or Ryzen 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: @1080p 60fps low. System Requirements might change in the future
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 10600 or Ryzen 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: @1440p 60fps ultra. System Requirements might change in the future

short_description: Explore the dynamic world of Afallon as one of eight powerful classes, each with three specializations, in a 40 square kilometer open-world singleplayer RPG that evolves with your progress, offering challenging dungeons, crafting professions, and unique companions for your adventure.
